title: Timezone data for Americas/Mazatlan incorrect
content: I noticed that when I get calendar invites from people in Mexico or I happen to be in Mexico (I travel full time), the timezone data is incorrect. I assume that the default timezone data for firefox does not account for Mexico abandoning daylights savings in 2022. How can I update this?
creator: brad50

title: Finding my Thunderbird password?
content: I have been using Thunderbird for my emails for a number of years and now need to provide my password, which I don’t know. Can anyone please tell me where I might be able to locate it or who I might contact to find out? Many thanks, Mike
creator: Hagan1

title: 設定読み込みエラー
content:
下記につきまして 解決方法をご教示いただきたく。

1週間前ほどからPCにて Mozilla Thunderbridを起動時に以下のポップアップが表示されます。

「設定読み込みエラー」「設定ファイルを正常に読み込めませんでした。システム管理者に問い合わせてください。

」
creator: sugihara-takumi

title: Thunderbird keeps asking for login of a deleted account
content:
Hi,

I recently removed an email account from Thunderbird. However, every time I start Thunderbird, a popup still appears asking me to sign in with the credentials of the account I already deleted (screenshot attached).

Steps I took:

Removed the email account via Account Settings → Remove Account.

Restarted Thunderbird.

The Google login prompt for the deleted account keeps coming back.

It seems Thunderbird is still trying to connect to this account in the background.

Could anyone advise how I can completely remove this account so Thunderbird will stop prompting me for the login?

Thanks in advance!
creator: tourcoder

title: outlookからのデータ移行について
content: outlookのアドレス帳、送受信データを他のPCのThunderbirdへデータ移行ができませんでしょうか？ outlookがインストールされたPCへThunderbirdがインストールできず、ThunderbirdがインストールされたPCへoutlookがインストールできない状況です。
creator: n00116

title: Error creating new account after update to Eclipse
content:
Hi all,

I just updated TB to the Eclipse version. I needed to add a new email account.

On the last page where the password for the account needs to be filled in I receive an error:

"can't access property "cleanup", this[#configVerifier] is undefined" (see screenshot)

All fields are filled in, account settings on the previous page were tested (required to be able to proceed to the "password page".

Any help would be appreciated as I now cannot add the email account to TB.

Regards, Dennis
creator: firefox3136

title: Cartelle locali sparite
content:
Buongiorno,

sono scomparse tutte le cartelle locali, come fare per recuperarle?

ed infine

come posso riportare alla visione anteprima della singola email una volta selezionata, ma senza aprirla?

Grazie infinite
creator: portoblu

title: Thunderbird opens unwanted email reply pane when PC wakes up from sleep.
content: I'm going to walk you thru this as it is not a problem that can be resolved by "press F8". If I have T'bird open and have just replied to the last email in my Inbox, the reply pane closes as usual. Then, if the PC goes to sleep, when I wake it up T'bird opens the email that I had previously answered in a reply pane as if I wanted to reply to it... which I have already done. This is somewhat annoying, and has only started happening in the last 6 weeks or so. Can this "helpful" function be turned off ?
creator: john.dalgliesh

title: Update
content:
Hello, Every time I update, this is the second time, Thunderbird tells me I'm using an old profile. I have to re-enter the username and password for all my accounts until the next update. What can I do to avoid this problem after two updates?

If this problem persists, I'll have to upgrade my software.

Sincerely,

translated with google
creator: f4ank

title: automatic line break issue
content:
Dear team,

Why is it that I selected “Use Paragraph format instead of Body Text by default,” but when I write an email, it still does not automatically wrap to the next line?

And ctrl+A, ctrl+R is still useless. The text still does not automatically wrap.

How do I set up automatic line breaks when writing emails?

Sincerely ask for help. Help me!!! T T
creator: aurora.huang

title: thunderbird
content: Ciao, sono spariti improvvisamente tutti i messaggi in arrivo e quelli spediti fino alle 10.00 di oggi. Come faccio per recuperarli ? grazie
